name: php5 DO together forever
short_description: php5_DO_together_forever is a php5(php4) code generate tool which binds Databases and Objects together. Click once and it generate 1000 or more lines of php5 data-manipulation codes. Nothing`s easier like this in php before! Also support prototyping dev.
